main_definition: Wednesday is the fourth day of the week, typically falling in between Tuesday and Thursday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The day of the week located between Tuesday and Thursday
meanings_and_examples.example: We always have a team meeting on Wednesday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A common term for 'hump day', referring to the midpoint of the workweek
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm glad it's Wednesday, we only have two days left until the weekend!

meanings_and_examples.definition: The middle of a set period or series; also used metaphorically
meanings_and_examples.example: Wednesday marks the midpoint in my marathon training schedule.
